info.name: Tutanota Plata Noir (Unofficial) Dark theme
info.description:
Dark Tutanota theme based on the Plata Noir GTK theme

This theme is not in any way affiliated with the Plata project.
info.additionalInfo:
This theme tries to use the Roboto font if it is installed on your system.  If you don't have it, you can download it here for free: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Roboto

A work in progress, there's still some work to do!

Source: https://github.com/NessInOnett/tutanota-plata-noir

Enjoy
